title: Weather Watch Face - G Watch R
summary: Weather Watchface with Customs Colours and Backgrounds

descriptionHTML:
Model Number: FR-D02
Weather Watchface is truly a Marvellous glimpse for your modern Smart Watch.

Weather Watchface is the next best thing that you want for your smart watch. Stay updated with the weather right on your wrist no need to take your device out every now and then to see the weather.

Customize your watch in style with the changing backgrounds as they change with the weather. If you are not a fan of changing backgrounds and still want to keep your watch simple just select the solid background. Select between a wide range of Colours to set as background.

It also notifies you about the unread messages or emails and that you select to display right on your watch screen so you can know what’s left unread.

This watch face is happening and combined with modern functions of Android Wear.

Key custom features:-

• Latest Weather updates
• Unread messages/emails notification
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Date and time information
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live

Visit our exclusive Watchface collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.

How it works?

Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.

Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: I can't get the thing to work. I downloaded it on my phone and my watch, and when trying to configure it on the phone, it says "Low Internet Connection". I tried to "reload" and I still get the same error. This is when both devices are connected to the same wi-fi that is not "low". The watchface is set to the default location set by the developer and is thus useless for knowing the weather for my area.  This is the second watchface that I have had problems with from this developer.

I really like this. At last today I have been able to download this again after a few attempts in the past week or so. And today it finally installed on my watch and I am very pleased with this watch face. I would like to apologise to the developer for my initial negative review.
Looks great Loving the design so far,  wish you could mix notifications.  (Phone battery and watch battery etc)
Won't work on My Moto G 2nd, refund did work either. Keeps crashing. ðŸ˜¬
Currently working on my Moto 360 with companion Nexus 6P. Hoping it stays that way. :)
Not working with gear 2 Still not working with Samsung gear 2 , send to wear nothing happens,  is there any solution for that
